aws_backup_selection.description: Manages selection conditions for AWS Backup plan resources.

name.description: The display name of a resource selection document.

plan_id.description: The backup plan ID to be associated with the selection of resources.

iam_role_arn.description: The ARN of the IAM role that AWS Backup uses to authenticate when restoring and backing up the target resource. See the [AWS Backup Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/aws-backup/latest/devguide/access-control.html#managed-policies

selection_tag.description: Tag-based conditions used to specify a set of resources to assign to a backup plan.

resources.description: An array of strings that either contain Amazon Resource Names (ARNs

type.description: An operation, such as `StringEquals`, that is applied to a key-value pair used to filter resources in a selection.

key.description: The key in a key-value pair.

value.description: The value in a key-value pair.
